summary: Experienced MDS Coordinator and licensed practical nurse with a strong background in geriatrics. Skilled in MDS 3.0/RAI, PPS/OBRA regulations, care planning, interdisciplinary team collaboration, and optimizing facility reimbursement while maintaining high quality of patient care. Proficient in PointClickCare and staff scheduling.
skills: MDS 3.0 Coding for OBRA and PPS

experience.title: MDS Coordinator
experience.description: Assist and open schedules for nurses and IDT to complete the MDS. Ensure data entered is accurate for maximum reimbursement. Develop programs aligned with residents' best interests while increasing facility reimbursement. Meet with IDT to ensure quality of care. Assist Restorative Nurse to establish appropriate and realistic care plans. Efficient in Point Click Care.

experience.title: Phlebotomist
experience.description: Obtain venous blood samples from patients ranging from infants to geriatrics. Experience in heel sticks to difficult venipunctures. 10 years of inpatient/outpatient experience.

experience.title: LPN
experience.description: Provided patient care and managed a team of CNAs; injections; diabetic management; CVA cases; wound care; GT management; psych care; medical-surgical; assisted living; IV care. Participated in 8 weeks of training on MDS 3.0/RAI, MDS 3.0 coding for OBRA/PPS, care assessments, and RUG IV payment systems. Performed vital signs, injections, glucose testing, dressing changes; CPR certified; GT feeding management; IV management.

experience.title: LPN
experience.description: Provided nursing care for up to 30 residents; supervised up to 4 CNAs; medication administration; nursing assessments and documentation; daily computer use; ongoing staff education and training; interdisciplinary team involvement.

experience.title: LPN
experience.description: Provided nursing care for up to 30 residents; supervised CNAs; care/medication administration; nursing assessments; daily computer use; staff education and training; interdisciplinary team involvement.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Nursing
